title: Test
yAxis: Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 1996_Atlanta to 2004_Athens, gradually increasing from 2004_Athens to 2008_Beijing, and lastly roughly constant from 2008_Beijing to 2016_Rio.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2004_Athens and 2008_Beijing.
Max Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars about 1218.0 was recorded at Year 2008_Beijing
Min Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars about 302.0 was recorded at Year 2004_Athens
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008_Beijing to 2016_Rio.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1996_Atlanta to 2004_Athens.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2004_Athens to 2008_Beijing.
